document.full_text: the connections of kentucky derby winner animal kingdom confirmed on friday the colt would run in next month's $1 million belmont stakes, the final leg of the triple crown.
document.title: derby winner animal kingdom to race at belmont
lines_and_colors: the connections of kentucky derby winner animal kingdom confirmed on friday the colt would run in next month's $1 million belmont stakes, the final leg of the triple crown.
